channel.title: Argon OSRS
channel.description:
Argon - Where your adventure shines!
[B][SIZE=3]Argon's Developers[/SIZE][/B] Fuzen Seth (Core & Content) Deceiver (Website & Content) Dylan / dikKutJoch (Website, Forum, Community) [SIZE=3] Information[/SIZE] Argon is Project Instanity based server using Eliminates v0.7 OSRS build.
[SIZE=3]Content Added[/SIZE] 19.7.2014 Added all OSRS item models. 19.7.2014 Added proper server configuration. 19.7.2014 Player's cannot drop items over 1m without getting a dialogue asking is the player sure.
[SIZE=2]Official[/SIZE] -Added bonus EXP system.
[SIZE=2]Item interactions[/SIZE] -Casket looting -Bones on Altar
[SIZE=3]Media[/SIZE]
Added proper bones to altar.
[img]http://puu.sh/ahTxL/e56fb26276.jpg[/img]
I've hopped to Ardi straight fixed some bugs and did some fixes at combat and decided to rewrite the whole combat system. Anyways i've added some OSRS models.
[img]http://puu.sh/ahg5A/a48ea1d187.jpg[/img]
Added the Abyssal Tentacle, will be achieved from a minigame. [img]http://puu.sh/ahmL9/9faec79a2a.jpg[/img]
This message comes up once you're dropping an item over 1 million coins.
[img]http://puu.sh/aigFE/0b4c7c7837.jpg[/img]
Thread is still badly in progress.

item.title: Argon OSRS
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“sorecheeny, post:4, topic:545180”][quote author=Elrick link=topic=664061.msg4438716#msg4438716 date=1405870544]
Why would you use boring models such as rock crabs? Too generic.

Why would you use shops to sell everything? ruins the eco and supply and demand, plus makes skills like fishing and herblore utterly useless.
[/quote]

All I ever see you do is bash on people for their work.[/quote]its called criticism, hes right, no economy server would work well with that configuration.

Read full topic

you ever gonna host this or is this just for the “fun”?

item.title: Argon OSRS
item.dc:creator: @FuzenSeth FuzenSeth
item.description:
@FuzenSeth wrote:

Argon - Where your adventure shines!

[B][SIZE=3]Argon’s Developers[/SIZE][/B]
Fuzen Seth (Core & Content)
Deceiver (Website & Content)
Dylan / dikKutJoch (Website, Forum, Community)
[SIZE=3]
Information[/SIZE]
Argon is Project Instanity based server using Eliminates v0.7 OSRS build.

[SIZE=3]Content Added[/SIZE]
19.7.2014 Added all OSRS item models.
19.7.2014 Added proper server configuration.
19.7.2014 Player’s cannot drop items over 1m without getting a dialogue asking is the player sure.

[SIZE=2]Official[/SIZE]
-Added bonus EXP system.

[SIZE=2]Item interactions[/SIZE]
-Casket looting
-Bones on Altar

[SIZE=3]Media[/SIZE]

Added proper bones to altar.

I’ve hopped to Ardi straight fixed some bugs and did some fixes at combat and decided to rewrite the whole combat system. Anyways i’ve added some OSRS models.

Added the Abyssal Tentacle, will be achieved from a minigame.

This message comes up once you’re dropping an item over 1 million coins.

Thread is still badly in progress.
